S06sspp2_2u:1092: na mārgākārajnatāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:1101: na sarvākārajñatāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:1109: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate.
S06sspp2_2u:1110: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi?
S06sspp2_2u:1112: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1113: yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1114: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1116: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo (ŚsP II-2 28)
S06sspp2_2u:1120: yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1129: yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1145: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1146: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1147: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1148: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1149: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1150: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1152: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1154: yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1155: yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1156: ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1157: yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1160: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1162: yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ, (ŚsP II-2 29)
S06sspp2_2u:1165: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1166: yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1169: yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1172: yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1173: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1174: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1175: yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1176: yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1177: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:1180: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1182: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1183: yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1184: yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1185: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1188: yo navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā navarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1190: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1191: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1192: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1195: yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1198: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1199: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1200: ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1202: yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1203: yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1204: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1205: ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1206: yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1208: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnān anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, (ŚsP II-2 30)
S06sspp2_2u:1209: yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1211: yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1212: ya abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1213: yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1214: yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1215: yas tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1216: yo vaiśāradyānām antpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1217: yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1218: yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:1219: yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā karuṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1220: ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1222: yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1223: yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1224: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1226: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1227: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1228: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā vedanayā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1229: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1230: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā saṃjñayā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā saṃjñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1231: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1232: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārair ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1233: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1234: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñāneṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1235: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1236: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ cakṣuṣā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1237: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yac cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1238: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ śrotreṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac chrotraṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1239: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1241: śūnyaṃ ghrāṇena yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1242: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1243: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā jihvayā yāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā jihvā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1244: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1245: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ kāyeṇa ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo na sa kāyo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1246: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1247: mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ manasā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tan mano notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1248: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1249: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1250: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1252: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śabdo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1253: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1254: gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo gandhena yaś ca śūnyo na sa gandho notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1255: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1256: rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo rasena yaś ca śūnyo na sa raso notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1257: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1259: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1260: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1261: dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā dharmair ye ca śūnyā na te dharmā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1262: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dharṃānām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1264: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1265: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1267: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1268: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1270: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1271: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1274: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1275: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1277: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yat kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1279: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan manovijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1280: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1281: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena yaś ca śūnyo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1282: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1284: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1285: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1287: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1288: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1290: yaś ca śūnyo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1291: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1293: yaś ca śūnyo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1294: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1296: yaś ca śūnyo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1297: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1299: yā ca śūnyā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1300: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1302: yā ca śūnyā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1306: yā ca śūnyā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1307: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1309: yā ca śūnyā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1310: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1312: yā ca śūnyā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1313: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1315: yā ca śūnyā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1316: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1318: yaś ca śūnyo na sa pṛthivīdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1319: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1321: yaś ca śūnyo na so 'bdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1322: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1324: yaś ca śūnyo na sa tejodhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1325: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1327: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vāyudhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1328: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1330: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ākāśadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1331: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1333: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vijñānadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1334: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1337: yā ca śūnyā na sāvidyā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1338: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_2u:1340: ye ca śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1341: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñānena,
S06sspp2_2u:1342: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1343: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1345: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1346: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1348: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1349: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1351: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1352: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1354: yā ca śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1355: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyām anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1357: yā ca śūnyā na sā tṛṣṇā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1358: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1360: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad upādānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1361: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1363: yaś ca śūnyo na sa bhavo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1364: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1366: yā ca śūnyā na sā jātir notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1367: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1369: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1370: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:1372: yā ca śūnyā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1373: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1375: yā ca śūnyā na sā śīlapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1376: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā (ŚsP II-2 35)
S06sspp2_2u:1379: yā ca śūnyā na sā kṣāntipāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1380: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1382: yā ca śūnyā na sā vīryapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1383: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1385: yā ca śūnyā na sā dhyānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1386: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1388: yā ca śūnyā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1389: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:1391: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1392: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1394: yā ca śūnyā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1395: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1397: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1398: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1400: yā ca śūnyā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1401: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1403: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1404: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1406: yā ca śūnyā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1407: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1409: yā ca śūnyā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1410: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1413: yā ca śūnyā na sātyantaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1414: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1416: yā ca śūnyā na sānavarāgraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1417: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1419: yā ca śūnyā na sānavakāraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1420: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1422: yā ca śūnyā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1423: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1425: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1426: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1428: yā ca śūnyā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1429: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1431: yā ca śūnyā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1432: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1434: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1435: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1437: yā ca śūnyā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1438: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1440: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1441: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1442: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānaṃ yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1443: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1445: samyakprahāṇair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1446: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1447: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā ṛddhipādair yā ca śūnyā na te ṛddhipādā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1448: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1449: indriyāṇi āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyānīndriyair yāni ca śūnyāni na tānīndriyāṇi notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1450: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_2u:1451: balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni balair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni balāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1452: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1453: bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni bodhyaṅgair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1454: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1455: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgena yaś ca śūnyo na sa mārgo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1456: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyānutpādo na sa mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1458: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny āryasatyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1459: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1461: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny dhyānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1462: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāny dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1464: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny apramāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1465: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1467: yāś ca śūnyā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1468: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1470: ye ca śūnyā na te vimokṣā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1471: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1473: yāś ca śūnyā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1474: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1476: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1477: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1479: yāś ca śūnyā na tā abhijñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1480: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhijñāyā anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1482: ye ca śūnyā na te samādhayo notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1484: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1485: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1487: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni tathāgatabalāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1488: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1490: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni vaiśāradyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1491: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1492: yāś ca śūnyā na tā pratisaṃvido notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1493: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1495: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāmaitrī notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1496: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:1498: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahākaruṇā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1500: ye ca śūnyā na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1502: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1503: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1505: yā ca śūnyā na sā mārgākārajñatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo (ŚsP II-2 39)
S06sspp2_2u:1508: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1509: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1510: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi?
S06sspp2_2u:1511: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1512: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1513: yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1514: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1515: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1516: yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1517: yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1518: yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1519: yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1520: yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1521: yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1522: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1523: yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1524: yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1525: yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1526: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1527: yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1528: yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1529: yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1530: yo ghrāṇavijñanasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1531: yo jihvāvijñanasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1532: yaḥ kāyavijñanasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1533: yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1534: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1535: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa chrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1536: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1537: yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1538: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1539: yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1540: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1541: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1542: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1543: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1544: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1545: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1546: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1548: yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1549: yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1550: ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1551: yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1554: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1555: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1556: yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1557: yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1558: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1559: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1560: yas tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1561: ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1562: yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1563: yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1564: yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:1565: yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1566: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1567: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1568: yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1569: yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1570: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.

S06sspp2_2u:1574: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1575: yo mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā,

S06sspp2_2u:1577: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1582: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1583: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1584: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāya vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1587: yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1589: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1590: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1591: ya ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1593: yo balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1594: yo bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1595: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1596: ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1597: yo dhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhyānāni,

S06sspp2_2u:1611: yo mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā,

S06sspp2_2u:1615: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1616: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś ca vyayo yac ca rūpaṃ yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ,

S06sspp2_2u:1739: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1740: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1741: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1742: yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1743: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1744: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1745: yaś cakṣuso vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1746: yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1747: yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1748: yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1749: yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1750: yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1751: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ, yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na sa śabdaḥ, yo (ŚsP II-2 45)
S06sspp2_2u:1753: yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1754: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1755: yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1756: yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1757: yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1758: yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1759: yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1760: yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1761: yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1762: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1763: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1764: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1765: yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1766: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1767: yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1768: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1769: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1770: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1771: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1772: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1773: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1774: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1776: yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1777: yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1778: ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1779: yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1781: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1782: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1783: yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1784: yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1785: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1786: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1787: yas tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1788: ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1789: yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1790: yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1791: yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:1792: yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1793: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1794: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1795: yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1796: yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1797: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:1800: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1802: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1803: yo mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1804: yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1805: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1810: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1811: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1812: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1815: yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1817: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1818: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1819: ya ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1821: yo balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1822: yo bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1823: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1824: ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1825: yo dhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1826: yo pramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1827: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1828: yo vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1830: yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1832: yaḥ samādhīnāṃ vyayo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1833: yo dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1834: yas tathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1835: yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1836: yaḥ pratisaṃvidāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1837: yo mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:1838: yo mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā karuṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1839: ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1840: yaḥ sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1841: yo mārgākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1842: yaḥ sarvakārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1843: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, yad etad ucyate (ŚsP II-2 47)

S06sspp2_2u:2274: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:2277: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_2u:2280: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_2u:2281: tasmin samaye bhagavan rūpasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06sspp2_2u:2402: athāyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:2404: rūpam anutpādaḥ, vedanām anutpādaḥ, saṃjñām anutpādaḥ, saṃskārā anutpādaḥ, vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2520: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2521: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2523: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2524: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2526: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2527_0: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
S06sspp2_2u:2527_1: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2528: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2531_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
S06sspp2_2u:2531_1: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2531_2: anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06sspp2_2u:2533_0: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaś catvāri
S06sspp2_2u:2533_1: vaiśāradyāny anutpādaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2551: buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ. tat prāptam eva bhavati śrāvakayāṇikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāptaiva bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:2553: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ bhede na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahasattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2555: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2557: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2558: arhatā pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2560: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāñ carati yad duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtane pratyanubhavati?
S06sspp2_2u:2564: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:2565: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpādasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi na samayaṃ cānutpādasya srotaāpattitvam icchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2567: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyānāgāmitvam icchāmi nānāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyārhattvam icchāmi nārhattvasākṣātkriyāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:2568_0: nānutpādasya pratyekabuddhatvam icchāmi na pratyekabodhir nāpy aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrecchāmi
S06sspp2_2u:2568_1: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caran nāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā
S06sspp2_2u:2569_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ janayitvāśakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2569_1: sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvattveyumātṛsaṃjñā janayitvā
S06sspp2_2u:2569_2: pitṛsaṃjñāṃ janayitvā putrasaṃjñā janayitvāsakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām
S06sspp2_2u:2569_3: arthakartun tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:2570: yathātmātmeti cocyate sa ca sarveṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2572: saced evaṃ saṃjñām utpādayitavyeti duṣkarasaṃjñām utpadayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2573_0: tathā hi na sa kaccit tad dharmam utpādayati nopalabhyate nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpāde
S06sspp2_2u:2573_1: tathāgatam icchāmi nānuttarā saṃyaksaṃbodhir yathā tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2573_2: na hy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptiḥ prāpyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2574: āha: kim punas tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi?
S06sspp2_2u:2577: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpānnena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇām.
S06sspp2_2u:2578: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2579: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punaḥ paramārthena dharmeṇa.
S06sspp2_2u:2580_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptir abhisamayo vā
S06sspp2_2u:2580_1: prajñāpyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā nāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho
S06sspp2_2u:2580_2: vā bodhisattvo vā prajñayate. na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir vābhisamayo vā srotaāpanno vā (ŚsP II-2 67)
S06sspp2_2u:2581: sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2583: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena?
S06sspp2_2u:2585: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2586: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paramārtheṇa karmaṇaḥ karamavipākaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2587: notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2588: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate, atha votpanno dharma utpadyate?
S06sspp2_2u:2589: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya dharmasyotpādam icchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:2590: āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
S06sspp2_2u:2591: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2599: jihvāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2608: dharmānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:2621: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2622: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2623: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2624: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2625: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2626: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.

S06sspp2_2u:2630: tejodhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2631: vāyudhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2632: ākāśadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2633: vijñānadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:2634: avidyāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2635: saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:2648: kṣāntipāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:2655: aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:2669: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2670: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.

S06sspp2_2u:2817: sarvākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:2818: śāradvatīputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate? athānutpāda utpadyate?
S06sspp2_2u:2819: āha: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpāda utpadyate, nānutpāda utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2820_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpāda ubhāv etau dharmau na
S06sspp2_2u:2820_1: saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2820_2: tad anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2822: śāradvatīputra āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti te mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:2823: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo hy āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2824: subhūtir āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 77)
S06sspp2_2u:2825: chāradvatīputra yac ca pratibhāti te mantrayitum iti,
S06sspp2_2u:2826: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na me pratibhāti mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:2827: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'pi me āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2828_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yaś cānutpādo yac ca pratibhānaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2828_1: ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarvadharmā ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
S06sspp2_2u:2829: āha: anutpāda ity āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2832: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2834: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhāno 'nutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2835: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2836: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ saṃjñānutpādaḥ saṃskārānutpādo vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2837: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2838: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2840: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2841: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2843: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2845_0: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
S06sspp2_2u:2845_1: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2846: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2848_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
S06sspp2_2u:2848_1: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2848_2: anutpādo dhyānāny anutpādo 'pramāṇāny anutpāda ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo vimokṣānutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2850_0: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ tathāgatabalāny anutpādo vaiśāradyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2850_1: anutpādaḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpāda āveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2851: srotaāpattiphalam anutpādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'nāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'rhattvam anutpādaḥ pratyekabodhir anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2853: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇānutpādo mantro 'nutpādaṃ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2854: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2855: āha: dharmakathikānām agratāyām ayam āyuṣman subhūtiḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2856: tathā hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripṛcchyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
S06sspp2_2u:2858: dharmataiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakānām aniśritānāṃ sarvadharmeṣu te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante (ŚsP II-2 79)
S06sspp2_2u:2859: tatas tata eva niḥsaranti. tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad aniśritatvāt sarvadharmāṇām.

S06sspp2_2u:2965: mahāmaitry āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2966: mahākaruṇāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2967: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2968: srotaāpattiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2969: sakṛdāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2970: anāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2971: arhattvam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2972: pratyekabodhir āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2973: sarvajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2974: mārgākārajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2976: chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2977: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyām upādāya.
S06sspp2_2u:2978: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:3013: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo 'bdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ tejodhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vāyudhātuḥ pariśodhayitavya ākāśadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vijñānadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3074: athāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra punar āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3075: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
S06sspp2_2u:3076: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā laukiky asti (ŚsP II-2 87)
S06sspp2_2u:3083: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
S06sspp2_2u:3085: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3086_0: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:3086_1: puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3086_2: vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam
S06sspp2_2u:3087: yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_2u:3092: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:3098_0: tac ca dānaṃ datvopalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3098_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā
S06sspp2_2u:3099: sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti, katameṣu triṣu?
S06sspp2_2u:3100: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti. iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti?
S06sspp2_2u:3101: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati, na ca saṃkrāmati tenocyate laukikī dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:3102: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3104: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP II-2 88)
S06sspp2_2u:3105: ca nābhinandati. iyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3106: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3107: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti?
S06sspp2_2u:3108: tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati tenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3109: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3111_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito
S06sspp2_2u:3111_1: bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya. idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3111_2: karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3111_3: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino
S06sspp2_2u:3111_4: bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati
S06sspp2_2u:3111_5: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3111_6: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3112: tatra katamā lokottarā śīlapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3114_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_2u:3114_1: sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca
S06sspp2_2u:3114_2: tac chīlaṃ niryātayati. tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_2u:3114_3: pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā śīlapāramitā tathā
S06sspp2_2u:3114_4: hi lokā carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3115: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3117: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3119: tasyaivaṃ bhavatv ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3120: iyaṃ kṣāntir ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karoti tañ ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ (ŚsP II-2 89)
S06sspp2_2u:3122_0: anena me kṣāntiphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv
S06sspp2_2u:3122_1: iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tā kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3122_2: kṣāntisaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣāntipāramiteti. tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati
S06sspp2_2u:3123: tatra katamā lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3125: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3127: sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3128: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:3129: tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3130: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3132: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:3133: tac ca saṃniśrita ārabhate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3134_0: ayaṃ kāya idaṃ cittam idaṃ vīryam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāñ carāmi
S06sspp2_2u:3134_1: tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3135: anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:3136: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīryapāramiteti. tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3137: tatra katamā lokottarā vīryapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3139_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_2u:3139_1: sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś
S06sspp2_2u:3139_2: ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_2u:3139_3: pariṇāmayañ cāpi ca nimittam na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā vīryapāramitā tathā hi (ŚsP II-2 90)
S06sspp2_2u:3140: lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3141: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3143: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3144: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3146_0: ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ
S06sspp2_2u:3146_1: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite
S06sspp2_2u:3146_2: sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:3147: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3148: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dhyānasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī dhyānapāramiteti,
S06sspp2_2u:3149: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati,
S06sspp2_2u:3151: tatra katamā lokottarā dhyānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3153: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:3156: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā dhyānapāramitā tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3157: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3159: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3160: tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhāvayati sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3161_0: ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cārthāya sarvapuṇyam anumodyate sarvabuddhān adhyeṣate upalambhayogena
S06sspp2_2u:3161_1: tac ca sarvakuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupāyena tasyaivaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3161_2: bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya iyaṃ prajñā imāṃ buddhājñāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3161_3: karomi. tāṃ ca prajñāṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3161_4: kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me prajñāphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa
S06sspp2_2u:3161_5: eva dharme sukhino bhavantv anutpādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:3162: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:3163: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ prajñāsaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī (ŚsP II-2 91)
S06sspp2_2u:3164: prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokān na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3165: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3167: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate prajñān nopalabhyate vipākaś ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:3170_0: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate
S06sspp2_2u:3170_1: lokottarā prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokāc caraty uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3171: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
S06sspp2_2u:3172: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3173: subhūtir āha: dānapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3198: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3205: catvāry āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3215: daśatathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3220: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3221: āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣman subhūte katamasyā ayaṃ pāramitāyāḥ puruṣakāraḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3222: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāyaṃ puruṣakāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3223: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP II-2 93)
S06sspp2_2u:3224_0: janayitrī sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3224_1: prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra parigrāhikā saṃgrāhikā sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3224_2: śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3224_3: caritaiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3225_0: anāgatā apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06sspp2_2u:3225_1: caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ye 'pi te āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3225_2: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:3227_0: sacet punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3227_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā veditavyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3227_2: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇāya
S06sspp2_2u:3227_3: sarvasattvānām aparityāgatāyai tac cānupalambhayogena viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06sspp2_2u:3228: āha: viharatum āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yam anena vihāreṇecchasi,
S06sspp2_2u:3229: avirahitaṃ cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikāreṇa,
S06sspp2_2u:3230: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3233: sādhu sādhv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra upālapsye upālapsya iti. ata evāyuṣmatā śāradvatīputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3234: sattvāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā sattvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:3885: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahita eva tena manasikāreṇa veditavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3887: atha bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06sspp2_2u:3888: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:3889: yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi taṃ tathāgatasyānubhāvena evaṃ ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:3890: yathā tvam upadiśasi. asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivartā.
S06sspp2_2u:3891: āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāne ayam trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāram akaṃpat prākaṃpat saṃprākaṃpat,
S06sspp2_2u:3910: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādur akārṣīt.
S06sspp2_2u:3911: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkaraṇe?
S06sspp2_2u:3912: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3913_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3913_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3914_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3914_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho imām
S06sspp2_2u:3915_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3915_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3916_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3916_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3917_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarapūrvasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3917_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3918_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3918_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3920_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3920_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3921_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimottarasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3921_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3922_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivādhastād
S06sspp2_2u:3922_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3923_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivopariṣṭād
S06sspp2_2u:3923_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3924: yasmin khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitānirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamāṇuṣyakānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpannā,
S06sspp2_2u:3925: teṣām api samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
S06sspp2_2u:3928: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasāhasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3929: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakrā devendrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3930: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau suyāmā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3931: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau saṃtuṣitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3932: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirmitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3933: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau vaśavartinā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3934: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahābrahmāṇas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3935: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ābhāsvarā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3936: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śubhakṛtsnā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3937: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bṛhatphalā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3938: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3939: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3940: yaś ca teṣāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3941: yaś ca teṣāṃ yāmānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3942: yaś ca teṣāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3943: yaś ca teṣāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3944: yaś ca teṣāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3945: yaś ca teṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3948: yaś ca teṣām śubhakṛtsnānām devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3949: yaś ca teṣāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3950: yaś ca teṣāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3951: sa tathāgatasya prakṛtyavabhāsasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06sspp2_2u:3955: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate,
S06sspp2_2u:3956: tathāgatasya prakṛtyā ābhāyāḥ purataḥ sarvās tā devānāṃ karmavipākajā ābhā na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante,
S06sspp2_2u:3957: tathāgatasyaiṣābhā sāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate viśiṣṭākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāte praṇītākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttarākhyāyate.
S06sspp2_2u:3958: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3959_0: ete bhadanta subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_2u:3959_1: devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devā tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_2u:3959_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06sspp2_2u:3959_3: devās te sarve saṃnipatitā bhadanta subhūte dharmaśravaṇāya prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3960: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:3962: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāraitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:3963: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3964_0: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikurūpadeśyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena
S06sspp2_2u:3964_1: ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06sspp2_2u:3964_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā ca śikṣitavyam. yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyai
S06sspp2_2u:3965: tair apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyam. ye punar avakrāntasamyaktvanyāmāt,
S06sspp2_2u:3966: te pratibalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3969: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode saced anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhyaye cittam utpādayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3970: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3971: tatra katamā kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_2u:3972: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena,
S06sspp2_2u:5149: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānapāramitāyāṃ caraty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5155: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5156: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5157: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāra ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5159: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ pañca balāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5160: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5162: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5163: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5164: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry apramāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5167: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5174: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5175: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5178: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭā daśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:5179_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate
S06sspp2_2u:5179_1: dharmā evaite dharmān abhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti paripūrayanti parispharayanti parimīmāṃsyante,
S06sspp2_2u:5180: nāsty atrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:5181: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5182: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5183: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:5184_0: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kausika bodhisattvasya
S06sspp2_2u:5184_1: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāś ca pratyavekṣate na kvacid dharmeṣu paricarati.
S06sspp2_2u:5185: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:5186: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūtte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na samavahitam?
S06sspp2_2u:5188: kathaṃ pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:5190: kathaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:5191: subhūtir āha: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad acittaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5193: iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5194: yad acintyaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatā acittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:5196: iti hi yā acittatā sā acintyatā yā acintyatā sā acittatā,
S06sspp2_2u:5198: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06sspp2_2u:5199: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasy utsāhaṃ dadāsi.
S06sspp2_2u:5200: subhūtir āha: kṛtajñena mayā bhagavan bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñena,
S06sspp2_2u:5201_0: tathā hi paurvakānāṃ tathāgatānām arham arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakais
S06sspp2_2u:5201_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu codito
S06sspp2_2u:5201_2: 'nuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitaḥ samādāyitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:5201_3: yato bhagavaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitaḥ. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06sspp2_2u:5201_4: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ evam eva bhagavann asmābhir bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv
S06sspp2_2u:5206_0: asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃharṣitāḥ
S06sspp2_2u:5206_1: samādāpitaḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_2u:5207: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:5208: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5209: yathā ca na sthātavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5215_0: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca saṃjñāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca
S06sspp2_2u:5215_1: vijñānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika
S06sspp2_2u:5216: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ, śrotraṃ śrotreṇa (ŚsP II-2 139)

S06sspp2_2u:5223_1: kāyaśūnyatā ca manaḥśūnyatā ca bodisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ

S06sspp2_2u:5286_1: ca vīryapāramitāśūnyatā ca dhyānapāramitāśūnyatā ca prajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5287: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.

S06sspp2_2u:5307_2: cānavarāgraśūnyatā cānavakāraśūnyatā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5335_2: cābhijñāśūnyatā ca samādhiśūnyatā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā ca tathāgatabalaśūnyatā
