S06sspp2_2u:6541: pratyekabodhir nimittety animitteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6542: pratyekabodhiḥ praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6544: sarvajñatā nityety anityeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6545: sarvajñatā sukheti duḥkheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6547: sarvajñatā śubhety aśubheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6548: sarvajñatā śāntety aśānteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6549: sarvajñatā viviktety avivikteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6550: sarvajñatā śūnyety aśūnyeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6551: sarvajñatā nimittety animitteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6552: sarvajñatā praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6553: mārgākārajñatā nityety anityeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6554: mārgākārajñatā sukheti duḥkheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6556: mārgākārajñatā śubhety aśubheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6557: mārgākārajñatā śāntety aśānteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6558: mārgākārajñatā viviktety avivikteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6559: mārgākārajñatā śūnyety aśūnyeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6560: mārgākārajñatā nimittety animitteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6561: mārgākārajñatā praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6562: sarvākārajñatā nityety anityeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6563: sarvākārajñatā sukheti duḥkheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6565: sarvākārajñatā śubhety aśubheti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6566: sarvākārajñatā śāntety aśānteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6567: sarvākārajñatā viviktety avivikteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6568: sarvākārajñatā śūnyety aśūnyeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6569: sarvākārajñatā nimittety animitteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6570: sarvākārajñatā praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6571: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6572: sakṛdāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6573: anāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6574: arhattvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6575: pratyekabodhir asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6578: srotaāpannā dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6579: sakṛdāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6580: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6581: arhan dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6582: pratyekabuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6583: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6584: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6594: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6608: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6611_0: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi
S06sspp2_2u:6611_1: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca
S06sspp2_2u:6611_2: tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6612: yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6613: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6614: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:6615: puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6616: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6617: pañcacakṣuṣy utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. katamāni pañca?
S06sspp2_2u:6618: māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6620: yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
S06sspp2_2u:6623: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6624: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6627: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6628: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180)
S06sspp2_2u:6630: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6636: kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6638: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6640: sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6641: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6642: anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6643: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6644: arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6646: atikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau sthāsyāmīti iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6647: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6648: sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6649: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6650: buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:6652: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye yathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭheyam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6653: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6654: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6664: tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6665: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6666: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,
S06sspp2_2u:6667: ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6668: na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6669: sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6670: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6671: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6672: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6673: na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6674_0: na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven
S06sspp2_2u:6674_1: na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo
S06sspp2_2u:6675: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6676_0: na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo
S06sspp2_2u:6676_1: bhaven na saṃsrtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6677: nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6678: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6679: nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)
S06sspp2_2u:6680: na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6681: nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6682: na dhyānaśabdo bhaven nāpramāṇaśabdo bhaven nārūpyasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na vimokṣaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6683_1: bhaven nābhijñāśabdo bhaven na samādhiśabdo bhaven na dhāraṇīmukhaśabdo bhaved iti
S06sspp2_2u:6684: na tathāgatabalaśabdo bhaven na vaiśāradyaśabdo bhaven na pratisaṃvidśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6685: na mahāmaitrīśabdo bhaven na mahākaruṇāśabdo bhaven nāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6686: na srotaāpattiśabdo bhaven na sakṛdāgāmiśabdo bhaven nānāgāmiśabdo bhaven nārhattvaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6687: na pratyekabuddhaśabdo bhaven na buddhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6688: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6689: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6691: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:6692: athāyuṣmataḥ subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmataṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_2u:6693: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6695_0: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthita iti apratisthitamānasaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:6695_1: khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthito vedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6695_2: na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthito vijñāne na sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6696: na cakṣuṣi sthito na śrotre sthito na ghrāṇe sthito na jihvāyāṃ sthito na kāye sthito na manasi sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6698: na rūpe sthito na śabde sthito na gandhe sthito na rase sthito na sparśe sthito na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6699: na cakṣurvijñāne sthito na śrotravijñāne sthito na ghrāṇavijñāne sthito na jihvāvijñāne sthito na kāyavijñāne sthito na manovijñāne sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6700: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthito na kāyasaṃsparśe sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6701_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6701_1: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6701_2: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6702: na pṛthivīdhātau sthito nābdhātau sthito na tejodhātau sthito na vāyudhātau sthito nākāśadhātau sthito na vijñānadhātau sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6703_0: nāvidyāyāṃ sthito na saṃskāreṣu sthito na vijñāne sthito na nāmarūpe sthito na ṣaḍāyatane
S06sspp2_2u:6703_1: sthito na sparśe sthito na vedanāyāṃ sthito na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthito nopādāne sthito na
S06sspp2_2u:6703_2: bhave sthito na jātau sthito na jarāmaraṇe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6704: na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6705_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6705_1: sthito na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6705_2: sthito na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6705_3: sthito nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6705_4: sthito na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6705_5: sthito nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6706_0: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthito na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthito na ṛddhipādeṣu sthito nendriyeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6706_1: sthito na baleṣu sthito na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthito nāryāṣṭāṅge marge sthito nāryasatyeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6706_2: sthito na dhyāneṣu sthito nāpramāṇeṣu sthito nārūpyasamāpattiṣu sthito na vimokṣeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6706_4: sthito nābhijñāsu sthito na samādhiṣu sthito na dhāraṇīmukheṣu (ŚsP II-2 184)
S06sspp2_2u:6707_0: sthito na tathāgatabaleṣu sthito na vaiśāradyeṣu sthito na pratisaṃvitsu sthito na
S06sspp2_2u:6707_1: mahāmaitryā sthito na mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthito nāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6707_2: sthito na mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthito na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6709: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6710_0: yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rūpe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6710_1: sthito nāsthitaḥ samjñāyām naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6711: cakṣuṣi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotre naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāye naiva sthito nāsthito manasi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6712: rūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śabde naiva sthito nāsthito gandhe naiva sthito nāsthito rase naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito dharmeṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6713_0: cakṣurvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotravijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇavijñāne
S06sspp2_2u:6713_1: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyavijñāne naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6714_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśe
S06sspp2_2u:6714_1: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6715_1: naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6715_2: naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6716_0: pṛthivīdhātau naiva sthito nāsthito 'bdhātau naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ tejodhātau naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6716_1: sthito nāsthito vāyudhātau naiva sthito nāsthita ākāśadhātau naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6717_0: avidyāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito vijñāne naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6717_1: nāsthito nāmarūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ ṣaḍāyatane naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe
S06sspp2_2u:6717_2: naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva sthito (ŚsP II-2 185)
S06sspp2_2u:6718: nāsthitaḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthita upādāne naiva sthito nāsthito bhave naiva sthito nāsthito jātau naiva sthito nāsthito jarāmaraṇe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6719_0: dānapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6719_1: naiva sthito nāsthito vīryapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6719_2: sthito nāsthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6720_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_1: 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_2: nāsthito mahāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_3: nāsthitaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_4: nāsthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_5: nāsthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6720_6: nāsthitaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6720_7: sthito nāsthito 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6720_8: sthito nāsthitaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6747: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sthātavyam ity asthānayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6749: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06sspp2_2u:6750: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,
S06sspp2_2u:6752: idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
S06sspp2_2u:6753: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
S06sspp2_2u:6757: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6758: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6759_0: anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
S06sspp2_2u:6759_1: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar
S06sspp2_2u:6760: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6761: devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?
S06sspp2_2u:6765: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6766: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6767: devaputrāḥ. api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6770_0: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid
S06sspp2_2u:6770_1: śrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ dvau puruṣau parvatakandare
S06sspp2_2u:6770_2: sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6771: tatra ubhayataḥ pratiśrutkāt svaro niścatet. tat kiṃ manyadhve? (ŚsP II-2 187)
S06sspp2_2u:6772: devaputrāḥ. api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6774: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:6775: tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6776_0: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam
S06sspp2_2u:6776_1: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhinirmimīte. catasraś ca parṣado 'binirmimīto bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ
S06sspp2_2u:6776_2: sa ca nirmitas tābhyo nirmitābhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6777: devaputrāḥ, api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6780: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
S06sspp2_2u:6782: uttarīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtir uttānīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitām iti,
S06sspp2_2u:6783: atha ca punar gambhīrād gambhīrataraṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:6785: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣām devaputrāṇām cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:6786: na khalu devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6790: na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6801: na mano gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6806: gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ, na kāyasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ, na manaḥsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6812: na dharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6824: na manovijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6836: na manaḥsaṃsparśo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6848: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6854: gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ, na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6860: na vijñānadhātur gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6878: na jarāmaraṇaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6896: na prajñāpāramitā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6921: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6931: nānavarāgraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ nānavakāraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:6962: nāveṇikabuddhadharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6988: na sarvākārajñatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6992: atha teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhūt: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6997: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7003: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7009: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7013: prajñapitaṃ, na kāyavijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ, na manovijñānaṃ prajñapitam.
S06sspp2_2u:7014: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7068: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni prajñapitāni,
S06sspp2_2u:7091: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpannaḥ prajñapito na srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7092: na sakṛdāgāmī prajñapito na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7095: na pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapito na pratyekabodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:7096: na bodhisattvaḥ prajñapito na bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7097: na buddhaḥ prajñapito na bodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:7099: athāyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:7100: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7101: apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
S06sspp2_2u:7102: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7103: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7104: ye 'nāgāmīphale sthātukāmā anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7105: ye 'rhattve sthātukāmā arhattvaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7106: ye pratyekabodhau sthātukāmāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ sākṣātkartukamā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7107: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
S06sspp2_2u:7108: evaṃ khalu devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7110: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvitīyakhaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ.
